item.title: OpenAI, Nvidia Join Trump’s ‘Genesis Mission’ To Power AI-Driven Science And Energy
item.description: The agreements set up a framework for coordination on future AI and computing projects led by the DOE.

item.title: Peter Schiff Slams DJT Of ‘Little Intrinsic Value’ After Trump Media’s Fusion Pivot — Says Political Leverage Is the Real Deal
item.description: The economist’s remarks reignited debate over Trump Media’s direction and the role of political influence in its latest deal.
